original_text: He will take your male servants and female servants and the best of your young men and your donkeys, and put them to his work.
korean_text: 그가 또 너희의 노비와 가장 아름다운 소년과 나귀들을 끌어다가 자기 일을 시킬 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will take your male servants and female servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희 남종과 여종을 취할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the best of your young men
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 청년 중 가장 좋은 자들도

sentences.original_text: and put them to his work.
